personality.description: Salim refuses to waver, no matter the odds. Once he sets a goal, he sees it through with unshakable determination, standing firm even when everything around him is falling apart. Salim chases every high, every challenge, every risk like he's possessed. Whether it's wealth, battle, or adrenaline, he can't stop himself from pushing further, faster, and harder - because the moment he slows down, he gets bored. And that is unacceptable.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 49%

- Unshakable once committed. Holds the line even as the world collapses.
- Restless, reckless, always hunting the next rush. Can't sit still.

personnel.description: Awarded Marksmanship of the standard award set: Gunnery Skill of 5+.

personality.description: Distractions are for other people - Ed doesn't indulge them. He keeps his attention locked onto the task at hand, tuning out anything that doesn't push him closer to success. Ed doesn't waste time on emotions or sentiment - only results matter. He makes hard choices without hesitation, cutting losses when needed and sacrificing whatever is necessary to secure long-term success.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 55%

- Tunes out distractions completely. Sees only the path forward.
- Cold logic, no heart. Cuts losses like dead limbs.

personnel.description: Awarded Marksmanship of the standard award set: Gunnery Skill of 5+.

personality.description: Planning has never been Lucille's strong suit. She follows instinct over strategy, letting adrenaline and quick thinking dictate her path. Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't - but either way, she never hesitates. Lucille doesn't wait for opportunity - she creates it. Whether it's training, strategizing, or climbing the ranks, she throws herself into every task with relentless determination, always pushing toward her next goal.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 48%

- Strategy ignored. Runs on instinct and adrenaline. Sometimes lucky, always fast.
- Makes their own opportunities. Relentless pursuit of the next goal.

personality.description: Asmaa treats the impossible like an invitation. She never slows down, never looks back, and never lets fear dictate her choices - because, to her, fear is just an excuse she refuses to entertain. Asmaa doesn't care what people think of her. Whether she's bragging, bending the truth, or cutting corners, she does what she wants without hesitation or embarrassment.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 55%

- Fear doesn't factor in. Treats the impossible like a dare.
- No shame, no hesitation - just does whatever they want.

personality.description: Raisa plays the long game, outmaneuvering competitors before they even realize there's a game being played. She makes alliances when they serve her goals, breaks them when they don't, and never loses sight of the bigger picture - her rise to the top. Raisa never lets things go, but she doesn't always act on it directly. Instead, she makes snide comments, "forgets" to relay important information, and subtly undermines people in ways that are just deniable enough to avoid confrontation.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 40%

- Strategic, cold, and calculating. Plays the game better than anyone.
- Undermines with a smile - dangerous.

personality.description: Nailah sees every situation as a puzzle to be solved, every person as a piece to be placed. She never acts without purpose, ensuring that each decision moves her one step closer to her ultimate goal. Nailah has seen too much weirdness to believe in accidents. She isn't chasing ghost stories - she's trying to understand something that shouldn't exist. Because if the Black Marauder is real, if it's out there, then at least there's an answer. Even if it's one no one wants to hear.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 50%

- Treats people like game pieces. Every action serves a greater plan.

personality.description: Parinita doesn't just take charge - she demands it. Every situation must unfold according to her design, and she has little patience for anyone who questions her authority. Parinita insists that every uniform, flight suit, and cooling vest is properly fitted before deployment. If she sees a tech in a grease-stained jumpsuit with an undone collar, they'll get an earful - because a ragged warrior is a careless one, and carelessness gets people killed.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 48%

- Authority is non-negotiable. No tolerance for dissent.

personality.description: Desirae has an instinct for reading between the lines. Whether it's a battlefield, a business deal, or a negotiation, she sees angles others miss and exploits them before anyone realizes what's happening. Desirae sees no reason to dance around the truth. Whether it's giving orders, delivering bad news, or calling someone out on their mistakes, she doesn't soften the blow - because in her mind, reality doesn't come with padding.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 47%

- Sees the angle, plays the angle, owns the outcome.
- Truth hits hard. So do they. Doesnt apologize for either.

personality.description: Every decision Casey makes is rooted in logic and foresight. She doesn't get caught up in reckless ambition or emotional distractions - she plays the long game, ensuring that her choices serve a greater strategy. Nothing really excites Casey, and nothing really bothers her either. She does her job, follows orders, and goes through the motions, but there's no passion behind it - just routine.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 51%

- Long-game thinker. Doesn't blink at setbacks - plans for aftermath.
- Clock punches in, clock punches out - soul never showed up.

personality.description: Håvar isn't just a fighter - he's a chess master with live ammunition. He sets traps, lures enemies into kill zones, and plays mind games that leave opponents scrambling while he calmly executes his next move. It doesn't matter if he's relaxing, performing his duties, or handling reports - Håvar makes sure everything is where it's supposed to be. Files? Sorted. Tools? Arranged by frequency of use. Supplies? Restocked and labeled. No one questions his methods anymore - because when they need something fast, Håvar already has it ready.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 47%

- Fights like a tactician, wins like a predator.

personnel.description: Changed his surname from Kukcenjac to Domki when marrying Casey Domki

personality.description: Once Joel makes up his mind, that's the end of the discussion. Plans don't change, orders don't get questioned, and he sure as hell isn't going to admit being  wrong - not now, not ever. Joel's writing isn't about ambition - it's about control. He's trying to make sense of the chaos around him, shaping it into something meaningful. The fact that people might actually read it someday is secondary. "If the galaxy's gonna burn, at least let me get the story down first."
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 54%

- Decisions are final. Won't revisit, revise, or admit error.

personality.description: Lilia doesn't do favors, fight for causes, or make sacrifices for free. If someone needs her skills, they'd better be ready to pay up, because when the money stops, so does her interest. Everything grates on her - people, orders, even the sound of her own comms. Lilia is always on edge, snapping at allies and enemies alike. Whether it's stress, trauma, or just who she is, her temper is a fuse ready to blow.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 48%

- Doesn't move unless the C-Bills do. Motivation ends where the payment does.
- Radio chatter sets them off. So do people.

personality.description: Ben refuses to accept anything less than perfection. He puts in the time, the effort, and the relentless focus needed to ensure that when the moment comes, he's ready for anything. Ben doesn't panic, but he's noticeably uneasy in large, open spaces. He sticks to shadows, corners, anywhere that makes the world feel smaller. "I'd rather not stand in the middle of this room. You never know who's watching."
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 46%

- Demands excellence. Prepares until theres no room for error.

personality.description: People want to believe Magda, and that's the danger. She sounds sincere, looks reliable, and acts like she has your back - until the moment it benefits her to do otherwise. Magda doesn't believe in blind optimism, but she's seen what happens when warriors lose hope. She give speeches because someone has to, because if she doesn't, then this war will swallow them whole before the next shot is even fired.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 45%

- Sounds like a friend. Acts like a liability.

personality.description: Trust is a weakness Gorgiy has no interest in. He keeps everyone at arm's length - sometimes through words, sometimes through force - because in his world, attachments are just another vulnerability waiting to be exploited. Gorgiy approaches every task with an obsessive level of precision. From the way he maintains his gear to the way he plans a mission, nothing escapes his scrutiny - because perfection isn't optional, it's necessary.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 53%

- Keeps people away - violently if needed. Trust replaced with defense.
- Obsessive with logistics. Checks everyones loadout twice.

personality.description: Micah doesn't trust anyone to provide for him, so he keeps everything for himself. Every credit, every round of ammo, every salvageable scrap is hidden away because he knows that when things go bad, only those who've prepared will survive. Micah fidgets because if he stops moving, his hands remember. He remembers the recoil of every shot, the weight of a dying friend, the texture of dried blood under his nails. He plays with his gear, taps his fingers, shifts his stance - not because he's impatient, but because stillness brings memories, and memories are worse than war.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 49%

- Survivalist mindset. Would rather let others go without than run dry.

personality.description: Maura measures everything - risks, rewards, weaknesses - before making a move. To her, emotion is just another factor to manipulate, and hesitation is a flaw she has no intention of indulging. Maura doesn't keep score - she gives freely, whether it's supplies, favors, or hard-earned wisdom. She believes that lifting others up strengthens everyone, and she never hesitates to share what she has.
personality.interview_notes:
Mental Aptitude Exam: 52%

- Emotion is leverage, not weakness. Hesitation isn't tolerated.
- Doesn't ask for anything back - gives like it's strategy, not charity.
